entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 9.
